name: Colors Skip -Tile Challenge
description:
it is mush easier to play now In this version we added lifeBar to give you more chances ! whenever you miss the life bar will shrink ! Control over your urges to tap the screen and you might be able to play this game! The tiles keep changing their color .. the banner on the top will tell you what color you can’t touch at each moment .. You need to tap on each tile until the number inside it is zero and it will evaporate! the catch is you can’t tap on the tile that has the forbidden color which is displayed on the top banner.
Each time you destroy all the tiles you will move on to the next level, where you will need to tap more on each tile to destroy it . How many levels you can go ? depends on how fast or slow your reflexes. How good of peripheral vision you have
Enjoy the dazzling illuminating colorful background with the dancing music, compete with your friends on the leaderboard see what level they can reach, and compete with your friends on the leaderboard!

This game is a part of three game series download them from AppStore
Colors Skip, Tile Challenge, Wheel Challenge and the Triangle Challenge!
